description: Fill in your gaming duty payment on account form online

sections.title: About you
sections.description: Provide your information before telling us about your business

fields.label: Telephone number
fields.helpText: If this is a UK landline or an overseas number, you must include the area or dialling code.

fields.label: Position in the company
fields.helpText: For example: director, company, secretary, agent

sections.title: Business details
sections.description: This is your registered business address. We will ask you later about additional sites for this return.

fields.label: Return period start date
fields.helpText: This date is on the letter sent out notifying you that the return is due, for example 01/10/2016.

fields.label: Return period end date
fields.helpText: This date is on the letter sent out notifying you that the return is due, for example 31/12/2016.

sections.title: Payment on account of Gaming Duty at 15%

fields.label: Number of premises paying duty at this rate
Part of total gross gaming yield chargeable at this rate

sections.title: Payment on account of Gaming Duty at 20%
sections.description: The next £817,000 is charged at 20%. If this band isn’t relevant, enter 0 in each box.

fields.label: Number of premises paying duty at this rate
Part of total gross gaming yield chargeable at this rate

sections.title: Payment on account of Gaming Duty at 30%
sections.description: The next £1,430,750 is charged at 30%. If this band isn’t relevant, enter 0 in each box.

fields.label: Number of premises paying duty at this rate
Part of total gross gaming yield chargeable at this rate

sections.title: Payment on account of Gaming Duty at 40%
sections.description: The next £3,020,000 is charged at 40%. If this band isn’t relevant, enter 0 in each box.

fields.label: Number of premises paying duty at this rate
Part of total gross gaming yield chargeable at this rate

sections.title: Payment on account of Gaming Duty at 50%
sections.description: The remainder is charged at 50%. If this band isn't relevant, enter 0 in each box.

fields.label: Amount of gaming duty paid on account
Part of total gross gaming yield chargeable at this rate

sections.title: Total payment on account of Gaming Duty
